description: This file defines the HomeScreen user interface component for an Android app, including a ViewModel that manages transaction and totals data, and composable functions to display financial summaries and recent transactions.

classes.name: HomeViewModel
classes.description: A ViewModel that manages transaction data and totals for the home screen, fetching data from a repository and exposing it as observable state.

methods.name: HomeScreen
methods.description: Composable function that renders the overview and recent transactions screen, displaying totals and a list of recent TransactionEntity items.

methods.name: TransactionRow
methods.description: Composable function that displays individual transaction details including category, date, amount, and notes.
